attributes.action: Not switch the timezone to europian time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been argued by the Conservative MP Tim Yeom that the UK should change the timezone from BST to European time.

He argues that this would reduce traffic accidents in the evening rush hour, but wouldn't the new change also increase the morning rush hour accidents, It would be darker in the morning, so people would not be quite so awake or alert.

 It would also give farmers less daylight hours in the morning, something complained about when this was tried in the sixties.

Mr Blair, please prevent this from going through, there really are no real benefits when compared to what would be lost.

-Jack
